title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, September 17, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss relates news of the Confederate Army's trip into Maryland, and their capture of 11,000 Federal troops in Virginia.
keywords: Military Strategy, Troop Movement, Military Authority, Family, Patriotism, Battle Description, Slavery, African Americans, Prisons/Prisoners, American Civil War
